name: Marky
body:
Marky ===== Marky is simple wrapper for converting strings/text to html using different markdown processors. It's the solution to assingment #2 of octobers Ruby Mendicant University. Based on intirdea's multi_json gem. Installation ============ [sudo] gem install marky By default, installing Marky will install also RDiscount, Maruku and BlueCloth if necessary. Usage ===== ```` ruby require 'marky' Marky.adapter = :maruku Marky.to_html("Hello, Marky") # => "

Hello, Marky

" ```` Adapters ======== * [RDiscount](https://github.com/rtomayko/rdiscount) * [BlueCloth](http://deveiate.org/projects/BlueCloth) * [Maruku](https://github.com/nex3/maruku) * [Kramdown](https://github.com/gettalong/kramdown) If you want to add another, just create a module into adapters dirrectory who implements to_html method.
